alert.note: Alert for Kinney (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 3:21PM CDT until April 28 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kinney County in south central Texas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 319 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Standart, or 11 miles west of Spofford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brackettville, Spofford, Anacacho, Fort Clark Springs, Laughlin AFB Aux Field, U.S. Highway 277 and Farm to Market Road 693. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
